title: Classroom-Based Action Research Workbook-Driven Training Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary education curricula, educational field experience (practicum or observation), and foundational research methodologies
context.additional_context: Workbook activities using digital devices combined with online collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.) and in-person mentoring

learning_goals: Action research plan writing that systematically analyzes classroom problems according to the five phases of the ADDIE model
Validating research problem feasibility through literature review and conceptual framework development
Proposing practical improvement measures for educational settings using quantitative/qualitative data collection and analysis tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
